#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
main()
{
    int i,j,k,t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m;
        scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int len=s.length();
        bool solve=false;
        char ch='*';
        int cnt=0,ans=0,neg=-1;
        for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            if(s[i]==ch)
            {
                cnt++;
            }
            else
            {
                ch=s[i];
                cnt=1;
                ans++;
            }
            if(cnt==m)
            {
                solve=true;
            }
            if(cnt>m)
            {
                cnt=1;
                ans++;
            }
        }
        if(solve)
        {
            printf("%d",ans);
        }
        else
        {
            printf("%d",neg);
        }
        if(t)
        {
            printf("\n");
        }
    }
}
